attributes.action: I want defibrillators put in local parks and near allotments sites
attributes.additional_details: Because I think everywhere needs them incase of emergency
attributes.background: I had to do help an unconscious male out near a ginnel close to a park and allotments and there was no defibrillators any where we need them in public parks please

rejection.details:
We understand you would like better access to defibrillators, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this similar petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325323
                
We could accept a petition calling for local authorities to be required to provide them in council run parks, if this is something you would like to see happen.
